glsa.title: Analog: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A Denial of Service vulnerability was discovered in Analog.

background.p: Analog is a a webserver log analyzer.

description.p: Diego E. Petteno reported that the Analog package in Gentoo is built with its own copy of bzip2, making it vulnerable to CVE-2008-1372 (GLSA 200804-02).

impact.p: A local attacker could place specially crafted log files into a log directory being analyzed by analog, e.g. /var/log/apache, resulting in a crash when being processed by the application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Analog users should upgrade to the latest version:
NOTE: Analog is now linked against the system bzip2 library.
